divs: sighting detailsi was getting off of the mechanicsburg exit off of route 81 s when i saw directly ahead on the horizon 10 or so red\orange glowing lights hovering in the sky. they were in an odd pattern, almost looked like the big dipper, sort of like an arch, but in a weird pattern. they didn't appear to be moving, they didn't seem to be connected to each other. there were no light towers or airplanes. i stared at them while sitting at the stop light wondering what the heck they were, then continued down the road. i decided to turn back to try to get a picture, and when i came back 2-5 minutes later there was only one light left and it was on the opposite side of the highway, more above than towards the horizon.
Summary: 10 or so red-orange lights in the sky, hovering, aranged sort of like big dipper in that they were almost in an arc shape, came back down the road a few minutes later and only one light was left, on the opposite side of the highway almost directly above.
